name: BHA6 - Dealing with Doppel Characters
description:
Dealing with Doppel Characters, consider this as a sequel of my BHA4 entry: Today's Training Regime. This time Gao and Fen are off to find mysterious "Doppelgangers" who were reported that people mistake them for the two, and it is up to them to find who are these two people and put a stop to them!

Character Speed List:

Unfocused Focused

Gao - Forward-Home 5 2.5

Gao - Spread-Seeking 4.5 2.25

Fen - Splash Set-Up 4.25 2

Fen - Aimed Set-Up 4.25 2.375

Knockoff Gao - Piercing Slash 4.5 1.85

Knockoff Gao - Spread-Crawling 4.75 2.125

Knockoff Fen - False Laser 5 2.5

Knockoff Fen - Rebounding Shot 4.5 2.125
